per_frame_init_1=rc1 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_2=rc2 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_3=rc3 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_4=rc4 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_5=rc5 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_6=rc6 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_7=rc7 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_8=gc1 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_9=gc2 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_10=gc3 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_11=gc4 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_12=gc5 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_13=gc6 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_14=gc7 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_15=bc1 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_16=bc2 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_17=bc3 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_18=bc4 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_19=bc5 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_20=bc6 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_init_21=bc7 = int(rand(100))*.01;
per_frame_1=ob_size = 1;
per_frame_2=mv_r = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(time*1.324);
per_frame_3=mv_g = 0.5 + 0.4*cos(time*1.371);
per_frame_4=zoom = .9;
per_frame_5=q4 = 0;
per_frame_6=q5 = 0;
per_frame_7=q8 = frame%8;
per_frame_8=wave_mode = if(equal(q8,7),1,0);
per_frame_9=dx = 0;
per_frame_10=dy = 0;
per_frame_11=monitor = rot;
per_frame_12=q7 = if(below(q8,7),wave_y,0);
per_frame_13=q6 = if(below(frame,StopFrame),1,0);
per_frame_14=wave_r = equal(q8,0)*rc1 +equal(q8,1)*rc2+equal(q8,2)*rc3+equal(q8,3)*rc4 +equal(q8,4)*rc5 + equal(q8,5)*rc6+equal(q8,6)*rc7 +equal(q8,7)*1;
per_frame_15=wave_g = equal(q8,0)*gc1 +equal(q8,1)*gc2+equal(q8,2)*gc3+equal(q8,3)*gc4 +equal(q8,4)*gc5 + equal(q8,5)*gc6+equal(q8,6)*gc7 +equal(q8,7)*1;
per_frame_16=wave_b = equal(q8,0)*bc1 +equal(q8,1)*bc2+equal(q8,2)*bc3+equal(q8,3)*bc4 +equal(q8,4)*bc5 + equal(q8,5)*bc6+equal(q8,6)*bc7 +equal(q8,7)*1;
per_pixel_1=x = .5-x;
per_pixel_2=y = 1-y-q7;
per_pixel_3=mksx = nsx;
per_pixel_4=mksy = nsy;
per_pixel_5=mkzm = nzoom;
per_pixel_6=mkcx = ncx;
per_pixel_7=mkcy = ncy;
per_pixel_8=warp = 5*sqr(x);
per_pixel_9=rot = (nzoom-1+warp);
per_pixel_10=nsx = 1;
per_pixel_11=nsy = 1;
per_pixel_12=nzoom = 1;
per_pixel_13=ncx = .5;
per_pixel_14=ncy = .5;
per_pixel_15=nh = 2;
per_pixel_16=nh2 = 2;
per_pixel_17=myx = (-int(x*nh)+x*nh-.489);
per_pixel_18=myy = (-int(y*nh2)+y*nh2-.8);
per_pixel_19=ndx = 2*(2*myx*myy);
per_pixel_20=jx1 = crr;
per_pixel_21=kx1 = 1-crr;
per_pixel_22=mjdx = ndx;
per_pixel_23=mjsx = nsx;
per_pixel_24=mjsy = nsy;
per_pixel_25=mjzm = nzoom;
per_pixel_26=mjcx = ncx;
per_pixel_27=mjcy = ncy;
per_pixel_28=dx = (jx1*mjdx+kx1*mkdx);
per_pixel_29=sx = (jx1*mjsx+kx1*mksx);
per_pixel_30=sy = (jx1*mjsy+kx1*mksy);
per_pixel_31=zoom = (jx1*mjzm+kx1*mkzm)+bass/88+mid/88;
per_pixel_32=cx = (jx1*mjcx+kx1*mkcx);
per_pixel_33=cy = (jx1*mjcy+kx1*mkcy);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float1 d = 0.005;
warp_4=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).x;
warp_5=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).x;
warp_6=`    float1 dxb = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).x;
warp_7=`    float1 dyb = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).x;
warp_8=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.005 + float2(dxb,dyb)*0.002;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`
warp_11=`
warp_12=`    float2 v = 0.01;
warp_13=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv).x;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`    
warp_16=`    ret.x += (ret.x - GetBlur3(uv).x)*.1;
warp_17=`    ret.x += 0.006;
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    ret.x = lerp( ret.x, lum(ret).x, 0);
warp_20=`
warp_21=`//--------------------------------
warp_22=`
warp_23=`    my_uv = uv + float2(dy,-dx)*0.05*(1.2-GetBlur3(uv).y);
warp_24=`
warp_25=`
warp_26=`
warp_27=`    v = 0.01;
warp_28=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv).z;
warp_29=`
warp_30=`    
warp_31=`    ret.z += (ret.z - GetBlur1(uv).z)*length(my_uv-uv)*120;
warp_32=`    ret.z *= 0.85;
warp_33=`    ret.z += 0.008;
warp_34=`
warp_35=`
warp_36=`
warp_37=`//--------------------------------
warp_38=`
warp_39=`    d = 0.01;
warp_40=`    my_uv = float2(-dy,dx)*0.05;
warp_41=`
warp_42=`    dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y;
warp_43=`    dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y;
warp_44=`    my_uv += uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.03;
warp_45=`
warp_46=`
warp_47=`
warp_48=`    v = 0.01;
warp_49=`    ret.y =tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv).y;
warp_50=`
warp_51=`    
warp_52=`    ret.y += (ret.y - GetBlur3(my_uv).y)*0.1 + 0.03;
warp_53=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret *= 1.00; //gamma
comp_5=`}
